The SEMORID Minimalist Men’s Wallet is a sleek and functional accessory designed for those who appreciate both style and practicality. Let’s dive into the details:  Design and Materials: Crafted with premium genuine leather and space-grade 6063 T5 aluminum, this wallet combines sophistication with durability. The Classic Carbon Fiber pattern adds a modern touch, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions. All-in-One Functionality: The SEMORID wallet features an upgraded design that combines multiple functions: Bifold Wallet: The main compartment can hold up to 12 cards, including an ID window. Pop-Up Card Holder: Pulling the trigger instantly fans out your cards for quick access, eliminating the need to rummage through your wallet. Money Clip: Securely holds your cash with a sleek metal money clip. RFID Blocking: Advanced aluminum technology protects your cards from unauthorized and contactless scanning, preventing data theft. Storage Capacity: Up to 12 cards can be inserted into the wallet. The pop-up aluminum case accommodates 6 cards. The leather cover provides space for an additional 3-4 cards. You can also insert 1-2 cards on the back of the wallet. Safe and Secure: The integrated magnetic closure keeps your contents safely secured, unlike other wallets that might accidentally fall open. The hanging hole on the side allows you to connect a lanyard for easy carrying outdoors.  In summary, the SEMORID Minimalist Men’s Wallet offers a perfect blend of functionality, security, and style. Whether you’re attending a business meeting or a casual outing, this wallet has you covered. Plus, the RFID-blocking feature ensures your cards remain safe from potential threats.

This card wallet from the Semorid store is top notch. I like the RFID blocking effect first off, since I mainly carry an assortment of cards these days with little to no cash ever. It is quite minimal but still features a very strong, sturdy design and materials and the pop-up feature where you can store a few select cards that can slide out from the rest easily by pressing the notch on the side. The carbon fiber look and feel is great. As far as features I really believe they thought of everything. I love the flap for your ID so you can quickly show that when needed without having to take it out the wallet. The metal clip is great as well in case you have any paper bills or receipts to carry or it can be used to secure the whole wallet into a pocket or backpack, etc. The opening they made is perfect for your thumb to press and slide out another one of the your most used cards. Based on the durability of this wallet, the quality build and minimal approach while having so many features, I would recommend this to anyone willing to give it a try.

It really checks all the boxes and proved to be a heavy-hitter when I was using it.  If you're in the market for a hybrid, then THIS is the one for you.

评论概述: This wallet is a great addition to your everyday carry
评论详情: The **Semorid Slim Aluminum Card Holder Wallet** is a sleek and practical accessory designed for modern men. Features are:1. **Quick Access & Large Capacity**:  - Equipped with an enhanced ejection mechanism button, this wallet allows you to pop up your cards swiftly.  - The aluminum cardholder can hold up to **12 cards**, depending on their thickness. With 3-4 additional cards (1 visible ID window inside) and 3 card pockets on the outside.2. **Ultra-Thin Profile**:  - The minimalist design ensures that the 0.4 x 2.7 x 4 inches wallet remains thin and lightweight.  - The aluminum cardholder measures **0.4 x 2.7 x 4 inches** and weighs only **4.2 ounces**.  - Say goodbye to bulky wallets—less is more!3. **RFID & NFC Blocking**:  - Advanced aluminum technology shields your cards from unauthorized scanning.  - Protects against data theft and prevents thieves from cloning your bank cards.4. **Secure Card Holding**:  - Inside, a metal casing ensures that your cards stay securely in place.  - No worries about cards slipping out unexpectedly.5. **Perfect Gift Idea**:  - Comes beautifully packaged in a gift box.  - Ideal for gifting to your boyfriend, brother, son, husband, dad, or male friends on occasions like Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, and Father's Day.6. **Quality Service**:  - If you're unsatisfied with the cardholder wallet, SEMORID offers excellent customer service.  - Contact them, and they'll address any concerns within 24 hours.In summary, the **Semorid Wallet** combines functionality, style, and security. Whether you're a minimalist or simply appreciate smart design, this wallet is a great addition to your everyday carry.

I love this wallet. Very slim & minimalist and it looks really cool.  I like how easy it is to use and looks very durable. Would fit a good amount of cards as well which is very nice. Perfect for gifts.

评论概述: Excellent wallet, but I still would like to see future improvements and model choices.
评论详情: The heart of this wallet is it's card safe, and safe is a good word. The core card holder is strong, I have cracked numerous credit cards over the years. They crack too easy because of embossing, thankfully most cards are moving to flat design since mechanical credit slip registers are a thing of the past. But even several flat cards have not made it till expiration in my old wallet before cracking, but now they are protected by a hard aluminum alloy case. Currently I have 4 flat cards and 2 embossed loaded and they lift and fan perfectly at the push of a button. The ID flap folds over and secures fairly well magnetically, covering the popup card slot so the cards are always securely retained in your pocket. The ID window is nice, but it is quite tight with my medical directive tucked beneath, just a little more space would be appreciated. The same is true of the 2 pockets on the outside of the flap, the under slot fits a flat credit card well, but the outer slot is very tight, my thin insurance card does well. The slot under the money clip fits a flat credit card well. The money clip fits 10 bills easily and holds about 20 bills max. It would be nice if another flap could fold over the bills to protect them in your pocket, the flap could also have a slot/pouch to stick temporary receipts, etc. This wallet is smaller than my older traditional wallets and provides much better protection to the contents, the thickness is just under 1". My old wallet was right at 1¼", so I think the flap over the money clip and pouch slot is feasible if well designed. The wallet is perfect for my front jeans pocket for best security and does well in the rear pocket as well. Overall this is the best wallet I have found and I think it will last for as long as any other wallet I have ever owned. I love the popup card feature, it works so smoothly and perfectly every time, I can fairly easy pick any card out of the fanned stack and have no trouble getting it back in the same position. A finger push on top of the stack easily sets them right back in their place and the flap secures the cards so they cannot eject of fall out in your pocket as several other similar wallets are noted for doing. I give this wallet a solid 5 star rating as it is and will watch for the Semorid brand to introduce future improvements and model variations that may fit my needs even better.

评论概述: Far, far nicer than the similar wallets on the market like this
评论详情: I was pretty surprised with this wallet. It's awesome! Talk about security. It feels good and I don't worry about the money clip moving any money around, and the cards stay in place and pop out extremely easy. It slim fits but looks nice, and it's better than what I tried by leagues - the other ones on the market that are less expensive are honestly junk and this is absolutely great.

评论概述: Just as described/shown. Desirable features. A bit heavy and very hard.
评论详情: Disclaimer: I ordered this as a gift; so, I am not the one to be carrying/using it. It looks just as shown in the ad. Neutral color of dark gray. (Do NOT get the impression that is it “top grain leather”. Feels/looks more like a man made material to me. ???) The ID window is hidden but easily displayed. The exterior card pockets are on both sides and should be very handy. Same for the (one) money clip – well placed, useful. We are to assume it has total RFID blocking. Talking points from recipient: It is heavy and hard – especially if going directly (and, comparing to) a genuine leather tri-fold (regular) type of wallet. Having said that, definitely will be useful but will not be an every day, go-to wallet. I think my overall rating is a bit generous. Had I been given the option this one is more like a 4.25 or 4.5. But in all fairness rated an overall 5 because it is very, very close to “as described”.

评论概述: My new addition to my everyday carry!

As expected.

This is an excellent wallet that has lots of storage for my debit and credit cards in addition to my medical cards and reward cards. The wallet has a magnetic fold out see-through window for your driver's license and there is two exterior card slots on one side and another pocket on the other side for cash. The best part, however, is the interior center storage which can fit 5-6 cards without issue and has a lever which will push out your cards to retrieve them when needed. The wallet is also very elegant and I like the carbon fiber design. The wallet is sturdy and doesn't flex and I have enjoyed using it so far. I highly recommend it!

The sole concern I have with this product is that I genuinely desire a stronger magnet. While it is slightly larger than my previous one, it can accommodate more cards. It performs well and is highly portable, allowing for use in various locations. Although I have not owned it for an extended period, I can discern that the quality is satisfactory and will likely endure in the future.

Needed a wallet with a money clip and this was the one. Fits all my cards with no issues and my cash with no problem while also looking stylish. Got a lot of complements for this wallet. Highly recommend.

I've been trying to go smaller on my wallet as I don't want to be that guy who has spinal issues after sitting on a 7 inch diameter billfold.  This wallet being my 4th go and I'm really glad I chose it. It's sturdy with the carbon fiber material and the solid metal box that houses the card pop-out mechanism. The slats for holding cards are solid as well and a standard US license fits. Previous slim-like wallets either didn't fit them or getting the ID out was like trying to extract a tooth. And finally with the "metal core" to it, there's no flexing of the wallet and curving of cards.
I am very impressed with this wallet it is designed very well holds all of my cards well. Decently big. Great design.
It works great, easy to pull cards out

评论概述: good pop-up feature, holds lots of cards, a bit thick
评论详情: I like this wallet, as it holds the 10 cards I put in it easily.  I keep my driver's license in the window (which opens up and magnetically closes into the wallet).  The only issue with that is that the magnet that holds it, while keeping it closed, does not really hold it in place well, so it slides from side to side a bit (even with nothing in the outer part to add to the thickness).I keep 8 cards (including a metal Amex Platinum that is thick) in the pop-up holder, and they all pop up just fine (they fit a bit tight, but hold in there well and do pop up).  I keep my driver's license in the fold out window, nothing in the outer pocket of that, and another card in the outside pocket (on the other side of the pop-up area).  It holds them all just fine, but as I said, it is a bit thick.  It is also maybe 15 to 20% wider/taller than my other minimalist wallets that that don't have the same pop-up mechanism.If you can handle the extra thickness, this is an excellent wallet that should hold enough cards for you (for a minimalist wallet anyway) and it is about 1/3 the price the its more expensive competitor that uses elastic to hold itself together.

评论概述: Amazing slim wallet that allows for a full size wallet replacement!
评论详情: I have tried several different brands and types of slim wallet and none have been able to give me everything I need to fully replace my full size.  This one is the winner for sure.  It has ID slot, multiple card slots on the outside on both sides, strong money clip, and room for 6 cards (but you can easily fit 7) inside with the really cool switch to pop them out all stacked up.  See video for a demo of all the features. In the vid I took some personal things out so as not to display private info so my ID isn't in the ID slot but use your imagination there.I was able to cheat and put a few more cards in the outside slots than it recommends with no issues,  as well as put a couple different ID's in the ID slot.It has a magnet to help keep it closed and works quite well.I have no complaints at all about this wallet and am glad I finally found a slim wallet that works for me.If you can't live without all your stuff all the time and are looking for a full size wallet replacement like I was, this may be the one for you.  It feels well made and not cheap.  I will update this review if it doesn't hold up over time but I've had it a couple weeks so far and I'm impressed.

Well so far the hubby hasn't lost it so it's a plus for that. His other wallets were so bulky, he would take them out of pocket, put on table and it was hit and miss with him leaving it there. So I thought I'd try these. Another one he had, he wasn't impressed with the card holder, this one he seems to like better. He said the ease of getting out cards was fine. He also likes that the outside card holder has an opening on bottom so he's able to slide his other ID card he needs out much easier. He likes to put his wallet in front pocket and with this one it's not so bulky where it's uncomfortable to sit down with it in pocket.

评论概述: Works well and as expected looks nice
评论详情: I like a minimalist wallet only they can be tough to find a good one. I have a few but this one looked worth the try and I would say it definitely is worth it. Feels good and well made I don't get the feeling that it will fall apart easily. There is room for more plastic cards in the popup holder than many others I've had. Many slide pockets for regular cards or gift cards you don't want to forget to use. finally the money clip is strong and yet flexible enough to hold a decent amount of bills. Very nice wallet for sure.

I ordered this wallet for my son, whose previous wallet was eaten by his golden doodle, but that's another story. While this wallet is thicker than most true minimalist wallets, it is designed to be RFID blocking, so the trade off in size is worth it for the protection. It is still much more compact than a traditional bi-fold or tri-fold wallet and can easily be carried in a front pants pocket.  There is a built-in money clip on the outside of the wallet, which some people love and others don't. There is a driver's license window on the inside flap. The RFID compartment can hold up to six credit cards. There is an additional card pocket on the money clip side and two more card slots on the front flap.  Overall, this is a very nice minimalist style wallet that would make a great gift. It has plenty of room for cash, ID, and numerous credit cards. The built in RFID blocking feature will hopefully protect the user from identity theft, but maybe not from golden doodles.
i got this wallet for my husband and he really liked it! Everything he really needs fits in here perfect. It’s not to bulky for him and it’s light weight. This is also a great fit for anyone

评论概述: Really is as promised, pretty cool how the interior holds cards and ejects in ascending stack
评论详情: This really is a great "slim" wallet. I'd say the only downside, and the reason I put slim in quotation marks, is that I wish there was a thinner option for those of us who like to carry fewer cards. Having the money clip and ID window are important to me so keeping those while having a thinner interior would be a big plus. Still, it is a great option and especially if you still want to be able to carry several cards while not keeping a fat wallet. There's a little instruction card in one of the pockets that shows how many cards can fit in each slot, and it comes in a holder box that is perfect for gifting as well. The coolest feature is definitely the pop-up card holder of the main compartment (the one I wish would be available in smaller sizes). It works exactly as advertised, popping your cards out in a discernible ascending order when you hit the switch.

I am a recent convert to the minimalist wallet. I have acquired 6 others and this version has been on my radar for awhile. I thought this type would be too thick and bulky but after receiving this one, I am glad I ordered it. I think it is well-designed with usable functionality in a slim style. One of the most important aspects of this wallet these days is RFID protection. The nicest feature to me, of this type is the flip-open see-through cover of the ID sleeve. I have not been able to find this feature on other wallets of similar design. This eliminates removal when required to show my DL. The other side of that flap holds 2 cards and has a thumb-push slot. The carbon fiber design of the leather completes the whole package for me. Then there is the small lever on the side that pushes up the credit cards which works as it should ejecting all cards at slightly different heights. Turn the wallet over to make use of the clip that securely holds folded paper money. There you'll also find another card slot with a thumb-push slot. Highly recommend this wallet.

I got this wallet for my husband because he is very much into compact wallets and I thought this one was unique with the side button which makes your cards pop right up for easy access. This part can hold up to 6 cards, and it is so smooth and easy to use. There are also other pockets on each side that can hold additional cards, as well as a money clip. I actually really like this wallet and am tempted to keep it for myself. I wish it came in additional colors like brown or even some lighter colors would be amazing. It does come with a very nice gift box as well, so you can easily gift it for any occasion. Great price too!

评论概述: A bit heavy, but very well made
评论详情: My husband had a lightweight version of something like this, and it basically disintegrated to the point where his credit cards were flying out all over.  He's lost two cards and had to put a hold on everything twice, so I said, "Enough!"  This one has the flap over where your credit cards go, so there's no escape for those little things!  The money clip on one side and the ID holder on the other make this ideal.  He's not a big fan of wallets, and this is still tiny enough to do the job even if it weighs a few extra ounces; it's worth it not to be locked out of my credit card while we wait for new ones!  It's worth the additional price over the cheap alternatives to have some quality protection for your most important things.  Well done.

This is my first time using this style of wallet. I think the features are cool, it does hold a lot. For me though, it's just a little bulky. My previous wallet was the traditional leather fold style. Maybe I'm old school. This wallet once filled with my cards and IDs seemed to be no slimmer than my old wallet. It is heftier and solid.

评论概述: Impressed with the quality of this one
评论详情: Trying a few different styles of wallets and this is my favorite so far. It's more "compact" than truly "slim" or "minimal" but it's a good balance of size and storage options. Materials feel sturdy and well built. I like that it's cash width, I usually carry quite a few bills so this just fits them better than smaller versions. ID sleeve is super easy and card slides out nicely every time. Cards fan reliably, mechanism is smooth. 6 cards is the sweet spot, fewer than 5 and the fan just isn't as smooth and they aren't as snug. Up to 7 cards (3 with raised numbers) works great. 8 would work if they aren't raised. The card slot under the cash clip is a really tight fit but fine for something you rarely need access to. Definitely recommend if you're looking for a card holder style with a bit more room and options.

评论概述: Great wallet.  Holds lots of cards, a money clip, & a see-through window for your Driver's License.
评论详情: Item arrived quickly and as advertised.  Great wallet for a fraction of the cost of the name brands.  Secure, convenient and a perfect thin size. Very satisfied with seller and product.

Love the compact size, side button to push cards up, and card slots. However, I always need to position the wallet in a particular way in order to easily get it into my pocket. I worry that over time, the material where the wallet folds will become frayed and possibly break. Otherwise, it seems to be of decent quality and nicely holds enough cards and cash.

Traditional minimalist wallets are too minimalist for my husband and probably a lot of other men. He likes to keep his business cards in his wallet to give out while out and about for work. His traditional minimalist wallet couldn't accommodate them unless he cut the cards down. This wallet actually has room for him to keep his business cards and keep them separate from his credit/debit cards. He also really likes the way the cards fan so you can easily grab the one you need.

评论概述: Not the most minimalist wallet, its chunky but still effective
评论详情: When I first opened the package and took out this wallet, I was ready to give it two stars at best.  Initially it seemed too big and too thick to be “minimalist.”  This is why I am slow at getting my reviews done.  I take my time and use a product for several weeks before I decide what rating to give it and what to say about it.Now, after using this wallet for several weeks my opinion has changed a little.I ordered this wallet because my previous minimalist wallet was getting old and falling apart.  My opinion on whether this can really be called minimallest has not changed.  My previous minimalist wallet was all leather and weighed 3.01 ounces empty.  It was also just a little bit larger in dimension than a credit card and only 3/16 of an inch thick.  It was truly minimalist!  As opposed to this wallet that weighs 4.1 ounces empty and is 5/8 of an inch thick at the money clip.  Exactly twice as thick as my old minimalist wallet.  On the positive side I was able to fit everything from my old wallet (which was full) into this new one and still have room for more.Despite not really being minimalist, this wallet has really grown on me.  I love the credit card pop up feature and my drivers license and CCW are able to be removed easily.I hope to get many years of service from this Semorid wallet.  At the time of this review it was selling for $36.99 which is a very good price for this feature rich wallet.
This is made of such nice quality material, the wallet is durable and functional, ive been using it for about a week now and i am in love with it! will be buying again!

I do like the style ad function. However after just a mo th or so of use it's  starting to wear. The fabric sections are showing signs of wearing where it makes contact with my jeans pocket. May not be up to the task of my line of work. Might be good for a suit or occasional use.

评论概述: Nice minimalist wallet with great features.
评论详情: I wanted a second wallet for days when I want to go to the beach and want a smaller wallet. This fit the bill perfectly. This wallet has a money clip, a pop up function for cards and a separate ID section. It is made of a lightweight aluminum case and is RFID blocking. This wallet can hold 12 cards, which is more than enough for my case. I really like that does not feel flimsy or cheap, in fact it feels really tough and sturdy, and I really like that.

评论概述: This is a Big Boys Slim Wallet
评论详情: So the term 'minimalist' gets thrown around a lot as a cool buzzword.  I suppose this fits into this category, but it is the largest of the slim wallets I've actually seen.  This isn't necessarily a bad thing, as I like to have more cards than fit into most minimalist wallets, so I have really enjoyed this one and it's my new permanent wallet.I keep mine in a cargo pocket, since I almost always wear pants with them, or a jacket pocket.  I could see this being uncomfortable in a back pocket unless you wear loose clothing.  The style is nice, and it is well-made.  I get to hold all my cards in something that pops them up easily, and a wad of cash attached to it as well.  Everything is easily accessible, I have no complaints with this model.

This wallet is exactly what I was hoping for! The wallet came very nicely and carefully packaged with a little note stating that it was "handmade with love," that really gives it a special touch. I was very pleasantly surprised by how strong the case feels and it can hold many cards and money safely. I love the flap which allows easy access to my ID and the money clip is very strong. This is a definite space saver compared to a wallet and will get much use over the coming years!

评论概述: Thin, mechanism works smooth, clean finish
评论详情: Great wallet, holds a lot of cards,  id flap is nice for quick access.

评论概述: Very cool looking and well made wallet
评论详情: This wallet looks very nice and feels very durable and well made. The carbon fiber look is a really nice touch.  It has some weight to it, and it might feel a bit too heavy for some. It has plenty of storage for bills and cards and a see through pocket for your ID. I like that this one has a pocket that folds over where your credit cards are kept as it adds an extra layer of security against loss. There is a spring inside the wallet that is depressed when you insert your cards that holds them snugly in place. The slide switch to eject them is smooth, but easy to depress. When you slide it, the cards move up and out of the case in a stepped fashion, which is nice because it's easy to see and select the card you want. I like this case, it's really nice and will not only be useful, but will give me an added sense of security against RFID theft.

评论概述: Nice Looking Minimalist Wallet, but not for Me.
评论详情: This product looks really nice, and would probably do well for someone wanting to part from their "George Costanza" wallet, but I already have a minimalist wallet that functions better for me than this Semorid product. First of all, this wallet looks and feels great, the metal housing is mostly covered by the exterior leather components, the card pockets on the exterior hold cards well, the ID window would likely become a picture spot for my wife, and the card storage on the inside brings forth your cards with a simple switch on the side. The money clip might be the biggest downside to this wallet, it's rather pointy in your pocket when you have three or more bills in it, so best to have the money side pointed to the outside when it goes into your pocket. The majority of the downsides for me are subjective, as it is much wider than my current wallet, holds less items, and is notably lighter. The Semorid's broad beam won't fit into the pouch that I placed on my EDC bag for my current wallet. It's a finely made product that doesn't fit my current needs, but I think I'll keep it and find some use for it in my EDC.
Bought for boyfriend,  he loves it, and get compliments on it from others, they always ask where they can get one

评论概述: Not minimalist, but thinner than a typical wallet
评论详情: In truth, I would prefer a wallet that was smaller, but there would be tradeoffs.  With this wallet, money you carry fits in the clip when folded in half; if the wallet were smaller, you would have to fold money into thirds.  I know many remark on how it feels to have the wallet in your back pocket, but I have never placed my wallet in my back pocket as it is harder to pickpocket out of the front pocket than it would from the back.  In the front pocket, I have no complaints about comfort or convenience.The card holder in the middle is a nice feature and it works very well for me, and I like having space to fit 2-3 more high use cards in the outer pockets.  I noticed one reviewer did not like that the chip was exposed when the card was in these outer pockets, so I just turned mine over before inserting it.  I like the overall look of this wallet and wanted to make sure my wallet would have RFID blocking.

评论概述: Ok I'm actually happy and impressed
评论详情: I hated it. I mocked it. I was emotionally terrorizing this carbon fiber anti-crypto wAllet. It's bulky. But nimble. Tyler is sleeve is quite snug. Faraday pouch holds onto the cards real well no matter how many. And when you pull the lever down it presents all of your cards, Cascade stacked perfectly every time

评论概述: NICEST SLIM WALLET I HAVE EVER OWNED
评论详情: The men in my generation always carried wallets (otherwise called billfolds) in their rear pocket. My chiropractor said it created a lot of good business for him. This younger generation eschewed the old school wallet in favor of these nifty slim wallets that could easily slip into the front pocket (majorly discouraging pickpockets). Since I surrendered the old leather wallet and joined the cool crowd, I have loved this style, but have also worn out a few. The feature I like most about this wallet over my others is the lever that pops up my credit cards. I will eventually wear this one out too, but I will be looking for the same feature in future wallets!

评论概述: Useful Minimalist Design, Carbon Fiber Styling is OK
评论详情: This slim wallet design from Semorid is a major departure from the bifold and trifold leather wallets I’ve used over the years. All of them had plenty of slots to hold cards. But the also featured a big pocket for paper bills and receipts, and that’s where I got into trouble. I stopped carrying cash years ago, but receipts constantly found their way into my wallet. Gift and loyalty cards too. Pretty soon, I could barely close the thing.  The design of this wallet doesn’t allow for such bloat. It features an RFID-shielded metal chassis that’s not much bigger than your standard cards. The left side of the chassis features an integrated “hangling” hole (a built-in metal loop) to which you could attach a carabiner. There’s a central chamber that holds the cards, and a right-side enhanced slide trigger to actuate the cards up in a spread so you can easily get to the card you want. Pushing the cards back in is effortless.  It comfortably accommodates up to 6 cards. Any more than that will strain, or even jam, the mechanism and make it difficult to get the cards in and out. The actuator grips the cards just enough to trigger them up, and they won’t fall out on their own if the wallet is held upside down. But it isn’t strong enough to prevent the cards from falling out of the chamber if you hold it upside down and shake. Do that, and your cards will fall out with less exertion than you’d expect.  So smartly, the wallet also features a card flap that folds over the top, preventing your cards from falling out. The flap has two card pockets on the outside and a clear window pocket on the inside for your picture ID. There are finger holes at the bottom of the outside pockets, and a finger hole in the center of the clear ID window inside, for easy card extraction. The flap magnetically attaches to the bottom of the wallet’s front side. The magnet isn’t particularly strong, but is enough to prevent the flap from flopping open on its own. Again, a good shake will open it with cards loaded on both sides. A similar pocket with finger hole is on the back side of the wallet, under a premium money clip.  The carbon fiber styling isn’t as matte as I was expecting, but it isn’t bad. The pockets and notches on one side are angled, seemingly to match with the diagonal pattern of the carbon fiber styling. The effect isn’t seamless, and seems a little forced, being that the angles of the pockets don’t match the angle of the carbon fiber. I think the pockets would complement the carbon fiber styling better if they went straight across, but that’s just me. This is otherwise an impressive, minimalist and useful offering from Semorid.  RECOMMENDED
Fácil de usar, compacta y muy elegante. Tiene partes en piel y otras en metal.
Is per pics shown. Nice

This wallet redefines the minimalist concept by offering unexpected capacity. Unlike previous slim wallets I've used, this one effortlessly fits my work badge along with my credit cards, solving a common inconvenience. The ability to hold up to 12 cards is impressive, making it stand out in the minimalist wallet scene. It may lean towards the larger side for a minimalist wallet, but the functionality and extra space are well worth it.
Excellent product! Very well made

I have tried 4 different wallets in the past year and this is the best by far. It has two external pockets for everyday cards, a slot for your DL and an additional pocket for a card under the money clip/ The slide mechanism works great and it makes it easy to grab your other cards. Only downside is that it is a bit bulky. Other than that, its a great wallet.

评论概述: Strong and stylish but not slim
评论详情: Sure, it's slim compared to your grandpa's trifold wallet. But it's not really slim. First off, heavier than most leather wallets out of the box (weight alone is not too bad, I'm one of those people that panicks about forgetting my wallet even though it's in my pocket... So more awareness of it can be nice).  I ordered this to replace my previous "slim" wallet which is pictured completely full next to this one completely empty and they are the same width. Besides the 7 cards in the inside pop-up, everything else adds even more thickness. As a result it is almost uncomfortable in a front hand pocket and unwearable in the back. There is nothing going on under the flap except for one ID card pocket. A whole flap seems extra. Maybe if the money clip was some kind of rod or band that stayed under the flap and was enclosed by it, instead of being in the outside, it would save on some if the bulk. I'm going to keep using it but can see myself replacing it within a year (the previous one lasted me over 5 and was just anothr cheap $10 Amazon item).  I do really like the pop out technology and that alone saves space... But you'd want a place to put cash and an ID that is separate, as well as most popular card, and there's gotta be a slimmer way to do it.

I already have a minimalist wallet that I love. But it holds fewer cards than this one, and I preferred a wallet that can fit more cards.  I’m unsure whether I’ll end up using this one though. While it does hold more cards, there are downsides to this as well.  For starters, since it does have a larger capacity, it is somewhat larger than the classic minimalist wallet. That said, it’s still more smaller/slimmer than the standard wallet.  Also, I found it difficult to remove cards from the outer flap, since the flap moves whenever I try pulling the cards. As you can see in my uploaded video.  Then again, it does fit quite a bit. I can fit 9 cards in the main slot (or more, depending on card type), and more + cash in the other slots.  So I’m still debating about this. Overall I still feel that it’s an important from the standard wallet.

评论概述: Well Made And Does The Job
评论详情: In the age of scammers stealing credit card information on an alarming regular basis, I needed something to prevent that from occurring over my previous method of having loose cards inside an old-school leather wallet.  This minimalist wallet from the Semorid brand seemed better than other similar products that I have seen being that it is foldable with designated areas for ID's and additional cards throughout its surface.  The RFID protecting aluminum box can hold up to 12 credit cards, but I thankfully do not have nearly that many and I now keep them inside where they are protected.  The cards stay inside with literally no chance or danger of them falling out of the device, and there is a convenient lever on the side that easily and safely dispenses them when they are required for use.As previously mentioned, other pockets for cards are available besides what can fit inside the product's aluminum box attachment.  Personally, I use those for my medical insurance card and other cards that do not contain electronic chips that can be accessed by scammers.  Those cards will remain safely inside the RFID protected aluminum box.  The foldable window-ID pocket is ultra convenient for my driver's license as well.  It is designed so that it is easily removable when it is required to be presented quickly.Overall, this device is a bit larger and bulkier than I originally anticipated, but not so much that it is uncomfortable or cumbersome to fit inside my pants pocket.  At first glance I thought that it would be slightly lighter in weight, but this is just a testament to the product's careful craftsmanship and obvious potential long-term durability.  Compared to my previous leather wallet, this device has made my life a lot easier, more efficient, and much more convenient.The current asking price is a bit steep despite the features and convenience that it promotes, but I often see coupons and deals attached this product that you can take advantage of and save a lot of money if you act quickly while they are still available.  For me, this wallet is definitely worth its price since it continues to save me time, space, and aggravation, not to mention the added security of its RFID blocking technology.

There are all sorts of wallets out there. I've been using a leather billfold style for years, and slowly eliminating items from it. I still have several cards (both credit cards and things like insurance cards) and so some of the extreme minimalist wallets are too small for me.  This one is a nice compromise, with space for a relatively large number of cards as well and dedicated places to put regularly used stuff.  I do with the magnet that holds it closed was stronger. It holds it okay, but doesn't feel 'secure'. It's fine for in your pocket.  absolutely love the spring loaded 'internal' pocket, that fans your cards out.

My husband loves the functionality of this wallet. The click that pops up the cards is super convenient and easy to use. The clip for money or to clip to your pocket works great and it’s overall stylish. Compared to another wallet he has it’s a little wider. He wishes it was a touch slimmer but he is still very happy with it and enjoying using it.

I've tried several minimalist wallets, but this one stands out.  The bi-fold design with extra card pockets is a plus. The card deployment mechanism is easy to use and feels durable after two weeks of use.  The wallet has a good feel in hand and offers plenty of usable card slots. I appreciate the RFID blocking feature, money clip, and ID window.  It's slim and fits nicely in my rear pocket. Overall, it's just the right size and has a high-tech cool look.  The construction feels solid and rugged, perfect for everyday use.

评论概述: Holds a lot but kind of thick
评论详情: This wallet is pretty functional. It holds a lot of cards. The popup part makes it super easy to gets my cards out. The wallet is a bit thicker than I expected, especially once you add cash in the money clip. It's almost too thick for my liking. The quality of the wallet seems to be great, though. Considering how many cards this holds, the thickness is almost forgivable. Overall, it's a good wallet. If it were a little thinner, it would be pretty much perfect.

I used to be the happy owner of a tri-fold wallet that turned more like sitting on a brick when it was full and wanted to get a more compact wallet that I could put in my front pocket.  This SEMORID wallet fit the bill and then some.  I hardly carry cash these days so having a wallet focused on cards was excellent. The mechanism to get the cards out is nifty and sturdy. I do like that it's the size of a standard wallet but way more slim as it fits in my front pocket perfectly.  The outside slots for card on the front and the one in the back is handy as is the money clip when I do have cash on me.  I would highly recommend these to anyone looking to make the switch from a standard wallet to a minimalist version.
